channel.title: My name is in the log-in menu
channel.description:
every time i open my server, my name and password is already there. how do i make it so it isin't?
I sent my server to a friend of mine and after loading bar loaded my name and password was in log-in menu , and he could've logged into my acc. help!
Pk Planet.

item.title: My name is in the log-in menu
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

CreatorAlex, thanks man , it worked

Read full topic
item.source: My name is in the log-in menu

item.title: My name is in the log-in menu
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Did you use a “Save your account” option on the client?

If so delete your username and password, and “Save your account”.

Then no one will see it if you release it then.

Read full topic
item.source: My name is in the log-in menu
